bug.short_desc: lollypop package in KDE community spin is missing a dep on totem-pl-parser
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: In the KDE community spin, the lollypop package is missing a dependency on totem-pl-parser.
How reproducible: 100% reproducible with the KDE community spin Didn't try with the main GNOME version
Steps to Reproduce: 1. `sudo dnf install lollypop` 2. `lollypop`
Actual results:
$ lollypop Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/bin/lollypop", line 22, in <module> from lollypop.application import Application File "/usr/lib/python3.5/site-packages/lollypop/application.py", line 19, in <module> gi.require_version('TotemPlParser', '1.0') File "/usr/lib64/python3.5/site-packages/gi/__init__.py", line 118, in require_version raise ValueError('Namespace %s not available' % namespace) ValueError: Namespace TotemPlParser not available
Expected results:
Lollypop opens
Additional info:
Installing lollypop shows the following list of deps:
$ sudo dnf install lollypop Last metadata expiration check: 1:00:57 ago on Fri Mar 24 21:55:51 2017. Dependencies resolved. ============================================================================================= Package Arch Version Repository Size ============================================================================================= Installing: id3lib x86_64 3.8.3-38.fc24 fedora 308 k kid3-common x86_64 3.4.5-2.fc25 updates 1.1 M libchromaprint x86_64 1.2-4.fc24 fedora 52 k lollypop noarch 0.9.230-1.fc25 updates 690 k lollypop-portal noarch 0.9.230-1.fc25 updates 24 k python-six noarch 1.10.0-3.fc25 fedora 35 k python2-pylast noarch 1.7.0-2.fc25 updates 68 k python3-beautifulsoup4 noarch 4.5.3-1.fc25 updates 177 k python3-cssselect noarch 0.9.2-1.fc25 fedora 40 k python3-html5lib noarch 1:0.999-9.fc25 fedora 215 k python3-lxml x86_64 3.7.2-1.fc25 updates 1.0 M python3-pylast noarch 1.7.0-2.fc25 updates 69 k python3-wikipedia noarch 1.4.5-2.fc25 fedora 35 k
Transaction Summary ============================================================================================= Install 13 Packages
Total download size: 3.9 M Installed size: 17 M Is this ok [y/N]:
as you can see, it doesn't include totem-pl-parser. Manually installing totem-pl-parser + deps makes lollypop work.

lollypop-0.9.230-3.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates.
